definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: There is no mandatory paid annual leave in the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 美國沒有強制帶薪年假。

sentences.english: According to legal effect and content, our compellent technical standards should be one of technique regulations.
sentences.chinese: 按照法律效力和內容，我國強制性標準就是技術法規。

sentences.english: They didn't develop those habits of mind by following mandated curricula.
sentences.chinese: 他們沒有開發這些頭腦的思維習慣強制遵循課程。

sentences.english: The new advisory covers several towns northeast of the mandatory exclusion zone.
sentences.chinese: 新提議的疏散區包括了強制隔離區東北的幾個城鎮。

sentences.english: I also modified the code in an attempt to coerce escape analysis into working.
sentences.chinese: 我也修改過代碼，希望可以強制逸出分析運行。

sentences.english: Compulsion in the area of family welfare must be ruled out for all times to come.
sentences.chinese: 在家庭福利方面的強制必須及時廢除。

sentences.english: The wills of states are the foundation for EIL.
sentences.chinese: 國家意志是國際法強制執行的根據。

sentences.english: Labels therefore had a unique force over artists.
sentences.chinese: 所以唱片公司對藝人有獨特的強制力。

sentences.english: The big problem with writing commitment contracts is enforcing them.
sentences.chinese: 關於寫承諾書的重大困難是如何強制執行它們。

sentences.english: This month, a woman in Lijin, Shandong, died during a forced abortion on her seven-month foetus.
sentences.chinese: 就在本月，山東利津一名女子死於強制墮胎。

sentences.english: The relief the plaintiff sought was an injunction and damages.
sentences.chinese: 原告請求的救濟爲強制令和損害賠償金。

sentences.english: Section One of this dissertation is about the creation of the non-coercive means of environmental administration.
sentences.chinese: 文章第一部分，環境行政非強制性管理手段的產生。

sentences.english: Elements on your page do not have to be confined to individual grid units. In a five-column grid, 5 narrow columns of text can be hard to read.
sentences.chinese: 你無須強制你頁面上的元素都限制於單個單元格。

sentences.english: Finally, the Yang Sen's over-anxious and compulsory policy should be criticized.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對楊森的急於求成和強制政策要給予批評。

sentences.english: Article 47 The period of compulsory isolation for drug rehabilitation shall be two years.
sentences.chinese: 第四十七條強制隔離戒毒的期限爲二年。

sentences.english: Now it's time to tackle your unenforceable rule.
sentences.chinese: 該是解決你的不可強制執行法則的的時候了。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
